name: Shorshe Ilish
details: A traditional Bengali dish made with Hilsa fish cooked in mustard sauce.
short_details: Ingredients: Hilsa fish, mustard seeds, green chilies, turmeric, salt, mustard oil. Recipe: Grind mustard seeds with green chilies to make a paste. Marinate Hilsa fish with turmeric and salt. Cook fish in mustard paste with mustard oil until tender.

name: Chingri Malai Curry
details: A rich and creamy prawn curry cooked with coconut milk.
short_details: Ingredients: Prawns, coconut milk, onions, garlic, ginger, turmeric, garam masala. Recipe: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in oil. Add prawns and cook with turmeric. Pour in coconut milk and simmer until prawns are cooked.

name: Aloo Posto
details: A simple yet flavorful dish made with potatoes and poppy seeds.
short_details: Ingredients: Potatoes, poppy seeds, green chilies, turmeric, mustard oil. Recipe: Boil potatoes and cut into cubes. Grind poppy seeds with green chilies. Cook potatoes in mustard oil with turmeric, then add poppy seed paste and simmer.

name: Kosha Mangsho
details: A slow-cooked mutton curry with a thick and spicy gravy.
short_details: Ingredients: Mutton, onions, garlic, ginger, yogurt, garam masala, red chili powder. Recipe: Marinate mutton with yogurt and spices. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger, then add marinated mutton and cook until tender.

name: Mishti Doi
details: A sweetened yogurt dessert, a staple in Bengali cuisine.
short_details: Ingredients: Milk, sugar, yogurt culture. Recipe: Boil milk and reduce to half. Add caramelized sugar and let it cool. Mix with yogurt culture and let it set in a warm place.

name: Macher Paturi
details: Fish marinated in mustard paste and steamed in banana leaves.
short_details: Ingredients: Fish fillets, mustard seeds, green chilies, banana leaves, mustard oil. Recipe: Grind mustard seeds with green chilies to make a paste. Marinate fish fillets with mustard paste. Wrap in banana leaves and steam until cooked.

name: Luchi Alur Dom
details: A classic Bengali breakfast dish of deep-fried bread served with spicy potato curry.
short_details: Ingredients: Flour, potatoes, tomatoes, ginger, garlic, spices. Recipe: Prepare dough for luchi and deep fry. Cook potatoes with tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and spices for alur dom.

name: Rasgulla
details: Soft and spongy cheese balls soaked in sugar syrup.
short_details: Ingredients: Milk, lemon juice, sugar, water. Recipe: Boil milk and curdle it with lemon juice to make chenna. Knead chenna and form balls. Cook in boiling sugar syrup until spongy.
